snippet: Minority ethnic Tamils said on Sunday they had been banned from commemorating the deaths of their relatives five years ago in the final battle of a 26-year war with Sri Lanka's military, a charge denied by the army....

headline.print_headline: Tamils Say Barred From Commemorating War Dead, Sri Lanka Denies
headline.main: Tamils Say Barred From Commemorating War Dead, Sri Lanka Denies

lead_paragraph: Minority ethnic Tamils said on Sunday they had been banned from commemorating the deaths of their relatives five years ago in the final battle of a 26-year war with Sri Lanka's military, a charge denied by the army.
